definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
Committee for Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland (North Korean)
pinyin: Zu3 guo2 He2 ping2 Tong3 yi1 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: So I want to see my great motherland to achieve peaceful reunification as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我愿意看到我们的伟大祖国能够尽早实现和平统一。

sentences.english: Island of peaceful reunification days not very far.
sentences.chinese: 岛和平统一的日子不会很远了。

sentences.english: A peaceful reunification is greater than having gold.
sentences.chinese: 和平统一，远胜过黄金和彩虹的辉耀。

sentences.english: A peaceful reunification is greater than gold and rainbow.
sentences.chinese: 和平统一的祝福，如彩虹般辉耀。

sentences.english: This is a law advancing peaceful unification between the sides.
sentences.chinese: 这是法律前进在边之间的和平统一。

sentences.english: The state shall do its utmost with maximum sincerity to achieve a peaceful reunification.
sentences.chinese: 国家以最大的诚意，尽最大的努力，实现和平统一。

sentences.english: Irish governments have sought the peaceful reunification of Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰政府寻求和平统一的政策。
